name: skeleton
description: Generic software architecture framework in Node.js using Fastify, designed to provide a flexible and reusable foundation for application development.
author: Luiz Ricardo Santos

scripts.pipe: npm run prebuild && npm run build && npm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: cp package.json dist/ && cp *lock* dist/ && cd dist && npm install --production

hooks.pre-commit: npm install && npm run lint:check && npm run test:cov && npm run build
hooks.pre-push: npm install && npm run lint:check && npm run test:cov && npm run build
